titles.title: For the relief of Mikael Adrian Christopher Figueroa Alvarez.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 19 - 9.

action.text: Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law Discharged.
Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 110-827.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 5.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in House

action.text: By request of Mr. King (IA) the House passed over the measure without prejudice.

committee.subcommittee: Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 6/5/2007--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Mikael Adrian Christopher Figueroa Alvarez.
